description: Your data is too big to fit in memory—loading it crashes your program—but it's also too small for a complex Big Data cluster. How to process your data simply and quickly?  In this talk you'll learn the basic techniques for dealing with Small Big Data: money, compression, batching and parallelization, and indexing. In particular, you'll learn how to apply these techniques to NumPy and Pandas.
title: Small Big Data: using NumPy and Pandas when your data doesn't fit in memory
